name: Townsend Security
tag_list: encryption, aes, security, key-management, xml, unix, linux, pci, hipaa, sox, sarbanes-oxley, glba, privacy-notification, compliance, massachusetts-privacy, logagent, pgp, data, technology, software, secure, encrypt, enterprise, appliance, guarantee
overview:
Townsend Security, the encryption company, provides data privacy solutions to help organizations meet evolving compliance requirements.

Data gets out. Encrypt it. We guarantee our NIST and FIPS 140-2 certified solutions will always meet or exceed the encryption and key management requirements in PCI, HIPAA/HITECH and other regulations.

We help businesses worldwide meet evolving legislation, technology, and data privacy requirements using: strong encryption and key management to secure sensitive data; managed file transfers, XML and web services to meet business requirements; and real-time system logging for comprehensive reporting on access attempts to confidential data.
